## TimeSpan.multiply() method

Returns a new TimeSpan object which value is the result of multiplication of this instance and the specified factor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiply(factor: number): TimeSpan;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  factor | number | The value to be multiplied by. |

<b>Returns:</b>

TimeSpan

TimeSpan - A new object that represents the value of this instance multiplied by the value of factor.
